mapper.select: SELECT distinct b.ID_NM, b.IUSER_ID, b.IUSER_NM , LISTAGG(a.AUTH_ID,', ') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY a.AUTH_ID) AS auth_id , LISTAGG((SELECT DISTINCT AUTH_NM FROM AUTHORIZATION WHERE AUTH_ID = a.AUTH_ID),', ') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY a.AUTH_ID) AS auth_nm , (SELECT DISTINCT FST_REG_ID FROM AUTHORIZATION_IUSER WHERE IUSER_ID = b.IUSER_ID) AS FST_REG_ID , TO_CHAR((SELECT FST_REG_D FROM (SELECT DISTINCT FST_REG_D,IUSER_ID, row_number() over(partition by IUSER_ID order by FST_REG_D desc) rn FROM AUTHORIZATION_IUSER ORDER BY FST_REG_D) WHERE rn =1 AND IUSER_ID = b.IUSER_ID ),'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS FST_REG_D FROM AUTHORIZATION_IUSER a, IUSER b WHERE a.IUSER_ID = b.IUSER_ID GROUP BY b.IUSER_ID,b.IUSER_NM,b.ID_NM ORDER BY FST_REG_D DESC

SELECT distinct b.ID_NM, b.IUSER_ID, b.IUSER_NM , LISTAGG(a.AUTH_ID,', ') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY a.AUTH_ID) AS auth_id , LISTAGG((SELECT DISTINCT AUTH_NM FROM AUTHORIZATION WHERE AUTH_ID = a.AUTH_ID),', ') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY a.AUTH_ID) AS auth_nm , (SELECT DISTINCT FST_REG_ID FROM AUTHORIZATION_IUSER WHERE IUSER_ID = b.IUSER_ID) AS FST_REG_ID , TO_CHAR((SELECT FST_REG_D FROM (SELECT DISTINCT FST_REG_D,IUSER_ID, row_number() over(partition by IUSER_ID order by FST_REG_D desc) rn FROM AUTHORIZATION_IUSER ORDER BY FST_REG_D) WHERE rn =1 AND IUSER_ID = b.IUSER_ID ),'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS FST_REG_D FROM AUTHORIZATION_IUSER a, IUSER b WHERE a.IUSER_ID = b.IUSER_ID
GROUP BY b.IUSER_ID,b.IUSER_NM,b.ID_NM ORDER BY a.FST_REG_D DESC
SELECT AUTH_ID, AUTH_NM FROM AUTHORIZATION MINUS SELECT A.AUTH_ID, (SELECT AUTH_NM FROM AUTHORIZATION WHERE AUTH_ID=A.AUTH_ID)AUTH_NM FROM AUTHORIZATION_IUSER a WHERE IUSER_ID = #{iuser_id}
SELECT a.AUTH_ID, a.IUSER_ID, a.FST_REG_ID, a.FST_REG_D, b.ID_NM FROM AUTHORIZATION_IUSER a, IUSER b WHERE a.IUSER_ID = b.IUSER_ID AND b.IUSER_ID = #{iuser_id}
